title.rendered: Pakistan Women vs Ireland Women, 3rd ODI: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Probable XI for Pakistan: Muneeba Ali, Sidra Ameen, Bismah Maroof (c), Sadaf Shamas, Aliya Riaz, Nida Dar, Kainat Imtiaz, Sidra Nawaz (wk), Fatima Sana, Nashra Sandhu, Ghulam Fatima

Probable XI for Ireland: Leah Paul, Gaby Lewis, Amy Hunter, Laura Delany (c), Orla Prendergast, Eimear Richardson, Mary Waldron (wk), Rachel Delaney, Arlene Kelly, Cara Murray, Jane Maguire

Pitch Report

Venue: Lahore

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 246

2nd innings average score: 204

Wickets per innings: 7

Type: Decent batting wicket. Gets slower as the match progresses.

Weather: Showers forecast. 30% precipitation.

Wins

Batting 1st: 33%

Batting 2nd: 67%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Ireland bowlers have struggled in the first two ODIs. They have managed to pick only 4 Pakistani wickets.

Meanwhile, the Pakistani top order has been prolific in their run-scoring. Between the top three batters, they have amassed 499 runs.

Also Read:

Pakistan vs England, T20 World Cup 2022, Final: Fantasy Cricket Tips

Smart Picks

In the process of not being dismissed in this series, Sidra Ameen has piled on 267 runs, including the highest score of 176. For her stupendous run, she has generated the maximum points (164.5) by any player.

Although Muneeba Ali hasn’t been donning the gloves, she could still be a decent pick in the wicketkeeper category. With scores of 107 and 27, she is the second-highest run-getter in the series.

Ireland will bank on Laura Delany for runs at the top. She was a part of the Ultimate Team for her knock of 69 (6 fours) in the first ODI.

1 / 5 ( 2 votes )
